name: Self-Help for the Elderly
description: Self Help For The Elderly is dedicated to improving the quality of life for seniors by empowering them to make lifestyle choices. SHFE is firmly committed in providing security, freedom, and peace of mind under our care to promote independence, dignity, self-worth and improve their quality of life. Self Help For The Elderly offers Health and Home Care, Assisted Living, Senior Housing, Employment Services, Education, Social Services, Day Care, Hospice Care, Activity Centers, and Home Delivered Me
